QuestData.Title: Terms of Surrender
QuestData.Description: Believe it or not, I have good news: we've already taken Lok-rath.$B$B<The vindicator beams with pride.>$B$BOur soldiers have captured most of the Warsong, including their leader, Uruk Foecleaver.$B$BI saved the honor of accepting his surrender for you. They're waiting for you inside, commander.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Secure terms of surrender and escort him back to Yrel's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: Commander $n.$B$B<Uruk Foecleaver looks at you and grins.>$B$BTerms of surrender? Hmm... let me think.
